slok:
ॐ तत्सदिति श्रीमद्भगवद्गीतासूपनिषत्सु
ब्रह्मविद्यायां योगशास्त्रे श्रीकृष्णार्जुन संवादे
पुरुषोत्तमयोगो नाम पञ्चदशोऽध्यायः ||१५||
transliteration: OM tatsaditi śrīmadbhagavadgītāsūpaniṣatsu brahmavidyāyāṃ yogaśāstre śrīkṛṣṇārjuna saṃvāde puruṣottamayogo nāma pañcadaśo.adhyāyaḥ ||15-21||

siva.author: Swami Sivananda
siva.et: Swami Sivananda did not comment on this sloka
siva.ec: Swami Sivananda did not comment on this sloka
